title: League of Legends
description: A simple web application that shows League of Legends champions and champion information. New gamers can visit this app and look for the champions that they want to learn more about.
technologies: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery, and LOL API (Unofficial)

title: Baby-Registry
description: It is overwhelming for new parents to shop for their little one. This is a baby registry web application that shows the most popular baby products of each category. So parents do not need to do the work themselves, we've done it for them.
technologies: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, RESTful Routing, Express.js, Node.js, MongoDB, and Mongoose Atlas.

title: Kelly's Nail Salon
description: This is a Nail Salon website inspired by my mother. I wanted to create a website for her nail salon to show her artwork, services, and help customers to make appointment online. This app features full CRUD, authorization, and authentication.
technologies: HTML5, CSS3, React.js, Express.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Mongoose, Bootstrap, and Google Firebase.
